name: hangman_game
description: This is a Hangman game built with React and Redux Toolkit. The game allows the user to guess a randomly generated word by entering letters one at a time. The user has a limited number of incorrect guesses, and each incorrect guess adds a part to a hangman figure. The game is won by guessing the word before the hangman is fully drawn, or lost by making too many incorrect guesses.

scripts.installAll: npm install && cd back-end && npm install && cd ../front-end && npm install
scripts.buildall: concurrently "cd back-end && npm run buildUI" "cd back-end && npm run tsc"
